divs: sighting detailsi've seen the ufo many times at night. it goes right,left,up and down. back and forth-up and down and i lost it one night because it ended up going below the hill and didn't rise up again that time.i've seen it many times and have shown other people also.nothing were supposed to have can move that way.many people have there own sightings and experiences.it looks like a plane or star but does not move like anything we are supposed to have.i get tired of watching it and i can't figure it out so after watching it for a while i go inside. it's crazy to me and i don't think i should call 911 so i'm glad i found you all.my mother is the owner of triangle t guest ranch off the 10 freeway exit 318 dragoon and it's 160 acres. any answers to what i'm seeing would be wonderfull. thank you for you'r time........[cms\tg\pid]
Summary: It looks like we are trying to learn how to fly them - maybe
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Benson
There were no other sightings in Benson on or around April 18th 2010
